name: Cloud Era
description:
Welcome to the Cloud Era

Helped by an old A.I. hostess who will drive you through a devastated spatial station, you'll discover an original universe and use an experimental cloud device.
You play a liquidator sent to Generosity, a spatial station surrounded by a dome. Discover what happened in the station and save humanity by activating the 4 Ion Sails.

Prototype version: 1 level is availlable to play
